author: fabiocos
body:
#### PR description:

During the recent code-format migration, that is systematically accessing all the packages, two code rules violations have been spotted in Validation/RecoB and HLTriggerOffline/SUSYBSM. This PR addresses them, with the exception so far of one try - catch block whose purpose is not clear to me.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles and passes basic code quality tests.
title: Fixes for code rule violations in Validation/RecoB and HLTriggerOffline/SUSYBSM
